title: Homoeopathic Medical Colleges in U.P.
description: This is the official Website of Homoeopathic Medicine Board, Uttar Pradesh that provides online information about the Board, list of Homoeopathic medical colleges in U.P. and activities of Board.
cleaned_text: After independence, Homoeopathic Acts were passed in various states including UP Homoeopathic Medicine Act 1951, MP Homoeopathic Medicine Act 1951, Maharashtra Homoeopathic Act 1951, Bihar Homoeopathic Act 1953, Delhi Act 1956, West Bengal Homoeopathic Act 1963 and state government accelerated the development of
